text: The Boys from Brazil is a 1978 British-American science fiction thriller movie directed by Franklin J. Schaffner and it stars Laurence Olivier, Gregory Peck, James Mason, Denholm Elliott and Steve Guttenberg. It was based on the 1976 novel of the same name by Ira Levin and was nominated for three Academy Awards. == Other websites == * Category:1978 thriller movies Category:1978 science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:British thriller movies Category:British science fiction movies Category:Mad scientist movies Category:Movies about racism Category:Jungle movies Category:Movies set in Brazil Category:Movies set in Sweden Category:Movies set in Paraguay Category:Movies set in Pennsylvania Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Franklin J. title: The Boys from Brazil (movie)
